info.name: Green RX - Patient Mobile App
info.description:
API Collection for Patient Mobile App

**How the patient gets their own info:**
1. Login ‚Üí POST /auth/login with email & password. Response includes **token** and usually **user** (id, email, role).
2. Decode the JWT or use login response to get **userId** (e.g. user.id).
3. Get full patient profile ‚Üí **GET /api/patients/user/:userId** with header **Authorization: Bearer {{accessToken}}**. Returns the patient record (including medicalHistories, familyHistories, allergies, childrenProfiles, etc.) for that user. Use this as "Get My Profile".
4. Alternatively, if you already have **patientId**, use **GET /api/patients/:id** to get that patient by ID.
5. All other patient endpoints (medical-history, family-history, children, allergies, etc.) use **:patientId** in the URL ‚Äî use the **id** from the profile (step 3) as :patientId.

**What Patients Can Do:**
‚úÖ Manage MY profile & medical history
‚úÖ Track MY allergies & diseases
‚úÖ View MY prescriptions (read-only)
‚úÖ Book & manage MY appointments
‚úÖ Report adverse drug reactions
‚úÖ Share MY medical records
‚úÖ Rate doctors
‚úÖ Search medications & diseases

**What Patients CANNOT Do:**
‚ùå View other patients' data
‚ùå Create prescriptions
‚ùå Access all patients list
‚ùå Perform admin functions

**Authentication:** All endpoints require Bearer token (except Register/Login)
**Base URL:** http://localhost:5000/api

item.name: Get My Profile by User ID

variable.description: User ID from login (use to get own patient profile)

request.description: Primary way for a patient to get their own full profile. Use the userId from the login response (or decoded from JWT). Returns patient with medicalHistories, familyHistories, allergies, childrenProfiles, etc. Use the returned patient.id as :patientId for other endpoints.
Accepts single object or array. Use array for form with multiple entries. Response: { message, count, medicalHistories }.
Accepts single object or array. Use array for form with multiple entries. Response: { message, count, familyHistories }.

request.description: Accepts single object or array. Use array for form with multiple children. Required: name, dateOfBirth (ISO), gender, ageClassification. Response: { message, count, childProfiles }.
